sentences.en: Prepare Passion Fruit Vinaigrette by mixing olive oil, passion fruit juice, shallot and dill together. Add salt and pepper to taste.
sentences.cn: 制作热情果汁调料，将橄榄油，热情果汁，葱和莳萝叶搅拌在一起。并加入盐和胡椒粉进行调味。

sentences.en: In To Kill a Mockingbird, Harper Lee based Dill on her childhood friend, Truman Capote.
sentences.cn: 在《杀死一只知更鸟》中，哈珀·李以她儿时的朋友杜鲁门·卡波特为原型塑造了迪尔。

sentences.en: Broil, bake or poach it with dill.
